question: Wildlife Crime Control Bureau is a statutory body under which ministry?
option3: Ministry of Environment Forest and Climate Change
answer: Ministry of Environment Forest and Climate Change
explanation:
The forest department of Assam and Wildlife Crime Control Bureau (WCCB) recently made a seizure of illegally smuggled marine life products.
Most of the seized products were sea fans and endangered aquatic species. This seizure is seen as the biggest of its kind in India. Wildlife Crime Control Bureau (WCCB) is a statutory body under the Ministry of Environment Forest and Climate Change.
